Index.meta_title: SaaS Template - The perfect SaaS template to build and scale your business with ease.
Index.meta_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.

Hero.title: <important>Effortless </important> PDF Generation for SaaS Applications
Hero.subtitle: Building and managing PDF templates shouldn't be a headache. <important>Templify</important> lets you create, manage, and generate PDFs effortlessly—without maintaining complex libraries or writing custom code for every new template.
Hero.description1: Scalable, API-first infrastructure that handles PDF generation for you
Hero.description2: No huge dev effort needed for every new template
Hero.description3: No more maintaining bulky PDF libraries

Features.section_title: Unlock the Full Potential of the SaaS Template
Features.section_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.
Features.feature_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.

KeyFeatures.feature1_description: Drag & drop editor for non-devs, API-first for developers
KeyFeatures.feature3_description: Automate tables, lists, and form data
KeyFeatures.feature4_description: Built to handle high-volume PDF generation

Working.section_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.
Working.step1_description: Get started instantly with Google sign-in

step2_description.description_1: Drag & Drop HTML Builder – Create stunning templates without coding
step2_description.description_2: Handlebars Template Engine – Code-based templates with real-time previews & dynamic data suppor

Working.step3_description: Easily manage templates from your dashboard
Working.step4_description: Use the Template ID, along with your Client ID & Secret ID, to generate PDFs on demand
Working.step5_description: Receive the generated document instantly via API for use in your app

Challenges.title: Why Is Dynamic PDF Generation So Hard?
Challenges.subtitle: Challenges
Challenges.challenge1: Maintaining complex PDF generation libraries that require frequent updates and fixes
Challenges.challenge2: Building new PDFs from scratch every time a new format is needed
Challenges.challenge3: Scaling PDF generation without slowing down application performance

Reviews.review1: Templify saved us weeks of dev effort—no more dealing with PDF libraries! Now we generate invoices in seconds.
Reviews.review2: The Handlebars engine + live preview is a game-changer. Dynamic table rows, real-time updates—it’s exactly what we needed!
Reviews.review3: We needed scalability for high-volume PDF generation, and Templify delivered. Seamless API, zero maintenance!

SecurityFeatures.title: Overcoming Hesitations
SecurityFeatures.subtitle: Trust & Reliability
SecurityFeatures.description: Your data stays protected, and your PDFs generate instantly – every time.
SecurityFeatures.feature1_description: Secure API key authentication ensures only authorized users generate PDFs.
SecurityFeatures.feature3_description: Comprehensive API documentation + email support for developers.
SecurityFeatures.feature4_description: Auto-scaling infrastructure ensures high-speed PDF generation, even at peak loads.
